group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:2004A09][name:sprite_0:effect_shake]Yaaaaaah!
Nice one!
I've got your back, finish it off!
Will do! Here I go!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:3016A05]Now, Sayaka!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:2004A09]Take THIS!
We did it... We beat it!
Yeah! Man, that Witch was tough...

group_1.textLeft: It would've been a real challenge to fight@it alone...

group_1.textRight: For real... Oh, here's the Grief Seed.
Take it!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?! [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]But we took it out together...

group_1.textRight: Actually I have plans with a very important@person after this.
I wanted to beat this Witch before that,@no matter what.
And the only way I managed to do that was@because you helped me, Kokoro...
So this is my way of saying thanks! Please@take it! I won't let you say no!

group_1.textLeft: Okay... Then I'll take it off your hands.

group_1.textRight: No, thank you! You helped me so much!
But I should head off now since I have plans.
Though I do still have almost an hour.

group_1.textLeft: Well, in that case, how about having some@tea with me?
My treat. Plus it'll be a good way for you@to kill some time. What do you think?

group_1.textRight: Oh no, [chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200401:cheek_0][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]you don't have to do that!

group_1.textLeft: Think of it as a thank you for the Grief @Seed.

group_1.textRight: All right, then! In that case, maybe I'll@order something nice and pricey...
*Giggle* I'm kidding!
